an4.172:1.1: Tatra kho ayasma sariputto bhikkhu amantesi:
an4.172:1.3: “Avuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato sariputtassa paccassosum.
an4.172:2.1: “Addhamasupasampannena me, avuso, atthapatisambhida sacchikata odhiso byanjanaso.
an4.172:2.2: Tamaham anekapariyayena acikkhami desemi pannapemi patthapemi vivarami vibhajami uttanikaromi.
an4.172:2.3: Yassa kho panassa kankha va vimati va, so mam panhena.
an4.172:2.4: Aham veyyakaranena sammukhibhuto no sattha yo no dhammanam sukusalo.
an4.172:3.1: Addhamasupasampannena me, avuso, dhammapatisambhida sacchikata odhiso byanjanaso.
an4.172:3.2: Tamaham anekapariyayena acikkhami desemi pannapemi patthapemi vivarami vibhajami uttanikaromi.
an4.172:3.3: Yassa kho panassa kankha va vimati va, so mam panhena.
an4.172:3.4: Aham veyyakaranena sammukhibhuto no sattha yo no dhammanam sukusalo.
an4.172:4.1: Addhamasupasampannena me, avuso, niruttipatisambhida sacchikata odhiso byanjanaso.
an4.172:4.2: Tamaham anekapariyayena acikkhami desemi pannapemi patthapemi vivarami vibhajami uttanikaromi.
an4.172:4.3: Yassa kho panassa kankha va vimati va, so mam panhena.
an4.172:4.4: Aham veyyakaranena sammukhibhuto no sattha yo no dhammanam sukusalo.
an4.172:5.1: Addhamasupasampannena me, avuso, patibhanapatisambhida sacchikata odhiso byanjanaso.
an4.172:5.2: Tamaham anekapariyayena acikkhami desemi pannapemi patthapemi vivarami vibhajami uttanikaromi.
an4.172:5.3: Yassa kho panassa kankha va vimati va, so mam panhena.
an4.172:5.4: Aham veyyakaranena sammukhibhuto no sattha yo no dhammanam sukusalo”ti.
